mapper.select: select p.prod_img, p.prod_num, p.prod_name, p.mem_num as seller, max(b.bid_price) as bid_price, b.mem_num as bidder, p.bidder_id as suc_bidder from prod p, bid b where p.prod_num = b.prod_num and p.prod_time < sysdate and p.prod_price != p.prod_cur and p.bidder_id is null group by p.prod_img, p.prod_num, p.prod_name, p.mem_num, b.mem_num, p.bidder_id order by bid_price desc
